message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm offering it to you first.  Would you be willing to pay $1,500,000?
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $1,200,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm confident this product is worth more.  Would you consider $1,350,000?
I understand your perspective, Alice. Given the situation, I am willing to increase my offer to $1,300,000 for the product. I hope this proposal will be acceptable.
